mapper.select: select bm.menu_id,bm.menu_name,bm.parent_id,bm.order_num,bm.icon, bm.menu_type, bm.path, bm.component,bm.visible from base_menu bm where bm.del_flag = 0 and bm.status = 0 and bm.menu_type <> 'b' order by bm.order_num

select bm.*,db.dict_label status_name,mt.dict_label menu_type_name from base_menu bm left join base_dict db on db.dict_value = CONVERT(bm.status,char ) and db.dict_type='base_status' left join base_dict mt on mt.dict_value = bm.menu_type and mt.dict_type='base_menu_type' where bm.del_flag = 0
and bm.status = #{status}
and bm.menu_name like "%"#{menuName}"%"
order by bm.order_num

select bm.menu_id as 'key',CONCAT(bm.menu_name, ' # ', mt.dict_label) as label, bm.parent_id from base_menu bm left join base_dict mt on mt.dict_value = bm.menu_type and mt.dict_type='base_menu_type' where bm.del_flag = 0 order by bm.order_num
